TopicTitle: Revert flight, flight results not working

Articles.Content:
Hello.  When I'm playing KSP and want to click revert flight, the revert menu choices do not appear.  The menu box does, and when I press ESC to unpause, nothing happens.  This also happens happens when I crash, and the flight results screen pops up, but with no content.  The only way to exit the game is to press Alt-F4.  I'm running 1.0.5 on windows with the mods: Trajectories, KAX, Kerbinside, MechJeb, and BDArmory.  Any help or reason would be nice!

Reproduction: Launch a vessel.  Either try to revert or crash it anywhere.

Edited April 18, 2016 by GKSP
reproduction

I had the no flight results problem. I fixed it by just hitting escape again and then one more time to bring up the results. Logs though?

You can get logs by going into KSP install folder KSP Data and selecting output_log. At least on Windows.

1 hour ago, kerbalstar said:

I had the no flight results problem. I fixed it by just hitting escape again and then one more time to bring up the results. Logs though?

You can get logs by going into KSP install folder KSP Data and selecting output_log. At least on Windows.

Thanks.  I'll Look when I an and tell you

3 hours ago, GKSP said:

Thanks.  I'll Look when I an and tell you

I've tried to use the "Insert other media" button to insert the log, but it says the action is not available for my account.  What do I have to do?

1 hour ago, GKSP said:

I've tried to use the "Insert other media" button to insert the log, but it says the action is not available for my account.  What do I have to do?

 

I think next post but you can do it. But

 you should upload it to somewhere like dropbox and link it here.
I have in dropbox.  If this link does not work, post it.
It's an obscure bug in Kerbal Konstructs that was fixed in one of the latest versions for KSP 1.1. I do not plan to make fixes backwards compatible for older versions of KSP.
